header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: food, exercise, choir, family plans, family members, punctuality, school, teachers, philanthropy
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, Inquiring, advising, annecdote telling, making arrangements

speaker.occupation: Former role as technical esport of development planning in oil industry
